message: Let's be fair and divide it 60-40!
I understand you want a larger share, so I propose a 52-48 split in your favor.  Let's close this deal before inflation eats away at the value.
I see you're willing to give me a larger share, but I think I deserve a bit more. How about 58-42?

I see we're getting closer, but I'm still not convinced. How about we meet in the middle of our last offers?
